Time Flies introduces players to a unique simulation adventure, letting them experience life from the perspective of a pixelated fly in a densely detailed, hand-drawn world. The game offers a blend of exploration, goal completion, and an emphasis on the fleeting nature of existence.

Gameplay and Visuals

Players navigate as a solitary fly, exploring a world rendered in a distinct, minimalist pixel art style. The environment is packed with details, offering numerous interactive objects and scenarios. The physics are designed to mimic the movemen
title: Time Flies Launches: Explore Life as a Pixelated Fly

Netcode Warriors, developed by Son Studios, is an upcoming anime-style fighting game featuring intense 1v1 combat and a diverse cast of characters. The extended trailer spotlights fast-paced action, unique character abilities, and online competition, all set within a vibrant, animated arena.

Gameplay and Visuals

Players engage in dynamic 1v1 matches, utilizing distinct fighting styles and powerful moves. The game's visuals highlight anime-inspired character designs, with bold colors and energetic animations. One showcased cha
title: Netcode Warriors Extended Trailer Reveals Anime-Style 1v1 Combat

Stomp and the Sword of Miracles is an exploration-driven metroidvania developed by Frogteam Games and Bee Braun. Players step into the role of Stomp, an impulsive young nubkin who acquires the ancient Miracle Sword to stop Duskman, the god of chaos, from destroying the world. The game showcases a colorful, cartoon aesthetic with expressive 2D animation and interconnected environments.
